Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: You've broken the rules of House Hlaalu, sweetie. It brings tears to my eyes when I think about your disloyalty.
Maybe you can make amends and make everything better.
It's unfortunate that you weren't able to win his support, pudding.
I was so certain he'd fall for you the way I did. Well, nevermind.
There is always other business.
Dram Bero will support you on the Council, but he doesn't care about you like I do, Dumpling.
I heard that Dram Bero has pledged to support you.
This will help your advancement to Councilman, Dumpling.
If you've already gotten his support for Hlaalu Hortator, it shouldn't be too hard to get his support on the council.
Just turn your charms on him once more, pudding. He'll yield.
I am sure he will support you if you can find him and state your case.
Alas, Dram Bero is very secretive and no one seems to know where he lives.
Ask around Vivec, dumpling, perhaps someone can tell you.
Dram Bero is very secretive. He lives somewhere here in Vivec.
Dram is my boss. You want to talk business, talk to him.
I don't know where he lives, but I've seen him on the top of St. Olms before.
I've seen him in the St. Olms Canton.
You have been expelled.
You have already found Dram Bero? And he died by your own hand? Perhaps word of his death has not yet spread to our Telvanni client...
But the Writ has been executed, so you must take the payment, Grandmaster.
You found and honorably executed Dram Bero, Grandmaster. Your work is excellent.
I have given this Writ to you already,
I have given this Writ to you already. As you know, Writs are issued only once.
Your official paperwork will exonerate you from your deeds when you are confronted by the authorities - so guard it well.
If you have lost it, you will have to suffer punishment for your crimes. This can be costly... very costly.
But members of the Morag Tong  must have immaculate reputations.
Dram Bero is a very secretive man who lives somewhere in Vivec City. Take this Writ and show him that he cannot hide from the Morag Tong.
I've seen him in the St. Olms Canton.
I don't know where he lives, but I've seen him on the top of St. Olms before.
I think he lives somewhere in Vivec.
Dram is my boss. You want to talk business, talk to him.
